domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

text:
A disabled man with coronavirus died after a Texas hosptial withheld treament, including hydration and nutrition. A doctor told the man’s wife, “As of right now, his quality of life — he doesn’t have much of one,” because he was disabled.

https://t.co/4QYTO96s0z

urls.title: Austin Hospital Withheld Treatment from Disabled Man Who Contracted Coronavirus
urls.description: After doctors withheld treatment including nutrition and hydration for six days, Michael Hickson died leaving his wife and five children behind.
